DeckMessage.label: Command message
DeckMessage.tooltip:
Message the bot will send to anyone the command is used.
Available parameters:
  $deck
  $cooldown

Commands.label: Commands
Commands.tooltip: Words the bot will be looking for, leave a space between each word to add more.

RIOT_TAG.label: Riot Tag
RIOT_TAG.tooltip: Your Riot Games tag (what comes after # sign).

RIOT_NAME.label: Riot nickname
RIOT_NAME.tooltip: Your riot games nickname (what comes before # sign).

RIOT_API.label: Riot API key
RIOT_API.tooltip: Your Riot Games API key. Do not give it to anyone you don't trust.

COOLDOWN.label: Cooldown
COOLDOWN.tooltip: How often request is called instead of sending cached value. Only really matters if the command is called more than 200 times in 2 minutes.
